title: How to Feel Better About Going Back to Work After Christmas
summary: After Christmas break, many people feel sad or worried about going back to work. This is normal, and experts say it's about changing how you think. On Sunday, you might feel the "Sunday blues" because you think Monday will be hard. To help, you can do fun things like exercise or see friends to make the switch easier. You can also do small things like taking a walk or getting your clothes ready for work. If you're worried at night, write down your thoughts on paper to feel calmer and sleep better. These tips can make returning to work less scary and more manageable.
